item.title: Securely Storing JWTs in (Flutter) Web Apps
item.description: I recently wrote a post about how to implement JWT Authorization in Flutter apps. I only considered the use case of writing a mobile app, so I recommended the use of the flutter_secure_storage package to store the tokens.
